meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unlucky.
meanings.sent1: Her unluckiness seemed to follow her everywhere she went.
meanings.sent2: His unluckiness with finding lost items was becoming a running joke among his friends.
meanings.sent3: Despite her unluckiness with plants, she decided to try gardening again.
meanings.sent4: The black cat crossing his path was a symbol of unluckiness in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The unluckiness of the situation was palpable in the air.

meanings.definition: The condition of having bad luck.
meanings.sent1: The unluckiness of the day was evident from the start.
meanings.sent2: She blamed her unluckiness on the broken mirror in her room.
meanings.sent3: His unluckiness in card games was almost comical at this point.
meanings.sent4: The unluckiness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over them.
meanings.sent5: The unluckiness of the situation cast a shadow over their plans.
